text: Edward kincg gret wel mine biscopes & mine eorles & ealle mine þeignes on þan sciren <þar> Seinte Petre into Westminstre haueð land inne & men frendlice.

& ic kiþe eow þat ic habbe gegifen him sace & socne, toll & theam, infangeneþeof & flemenes firmth, <grithbrice> & hamsocne & foresteal inne tid & ut of tid, on stræte & of stræte binnan burh & butan swa ful & swa forð swa hit me silfan on handa stod.
& ic nelle geþafian þat anig man anig onsting habbe ofer his land ne ofer his men be strande ne be lande butan se abbod to þæs minstres neode.
